Commute - For CTA 'L' Riders Home

About

Welcome. The goal of this app is to make your CTA commute easier. It is intended to be minimal and only show you the things you care about and none of the things you don't.

Target Users

The application currently is intended for CTA 'L' Train commuters. It assumes you ride the train to and from work and utilize the same stations. Down the line we will add features to further customize your commute.

Disclaimers

Please note that the data we serve is only as good as what the CTA provides via their API. You can add padding to train arrival times in your settings.

Please note that we are not affiliated with the CTA. All data is provided by the CTA, and we provide no guarantee that any of the data they provide or that we serve to you is accurate. Furthermore you agree to use this software at your own risk.

But you use CTA branding? Yes, we try to strictly follow the CTA Trademark Guidelines for Developers. If you find any violations of these guides please let us know and we will quickly remedy the situation.

Learn More

If you want to read more about how this application can help you own your commute, please read the how it works page.

Request a Feature & Feedback

Something you want to see us add that would help make your commute even easier? please send all feedback and feature suggestions to {EMAIL ADDRESS HERE}.

Thanks for stopping by, Chicago.
